Message: I am so tired, I feel so sick, can we just stop?
Don't give up now! You're doing great! Just take a short break and then we'll get back to it. How about some water?
I am dying, I can't make it.
Come on! You've got this! Let's try one more set. I know you can do it!
I don't like doing sport, I don't wanna to run.
That's okay! We don't have to run if you don't want to. But let me ask you, what do you think would happen if you did start running? Would you feel proud of yourself?
